downloadTitle: Microsoft Dynamics 365 Project Service Automation Add-in for Microsoft Project
downloadDescription: The Microsoft Dynamics 365 Project Service Automation Add-in for Microsoft Project gives users the ability to manage their PSA project plans in the familiar project management tool, Microsoft Project. Compatible with D365 for PSA V3.4+

downloadFile.name: Microsoft Dynamics 365 Project Service Automation Add-in for Microsoft Project x86.msi
downloadFile.url: https://download.microsoft.com/download/d/5/1/d51a2c34-35d7-4bf2-8e0e-6d28b5d3c9bd/Microsoft Dynamics 365 Project Service Automation Add-in for Microsoft Project x86.msi

downloadFile.name: Microsoft Dynamics 365 Project Service Automation Add-in for Microsoft Project x64.msi
downloadFile.url: https://download.microsoft.com/download/d/5/1/d51a2c34-35d7-4bf2-8e0e-6d28b5d3c9bd/Microsoft Dynamics 365 Project Service Automation Add-in for Microsoft Project x64.msi

detailsSection:
The PSA Add-in for Microsoft Project lets users manage their PSA project plans in Microsoft Project, a project management tool. From the add-in, users can read and publish project plans to PSA at the click of a button.
  • Quickly and easily import project plans and project templates from PSA into Microsoft Project.
  • Publish project plans and templates to PSA.
  • Create project teams inside PSA from Microsoft Project.
  • Find PSA resources and assign them to project plans from Microsoft Project.
For later versions of PSA (V2.X), download the add-in from Microsoft Download Center.
detailsSection_file_name: Microsoft Dynamics 365 Project Service Automation Add-in for Microsoft Project x86.msi
Microsoft Dynamics 365 Project Service Automation Add-in for Microsoft Project x64.msi
systemRequirementsSection:
• Windows 10 or Windows 10 Anniversary Edition (version 1607)
  • Microsoft Project Professional 2016
  • A working Dynamics 365 Project Service Automation implementation, version 3.4+
installInstructionSection:
Important! If you install the 32-bit version of Microsoft Project, you must use the 32-bit version of the add-in. If you install the 64-bit version of Microsoft Project, you must use the 64-bit version of the add-in.
  1. Double-click the .msi file to start the Setup wizard.
  2. Click Next
  3. Accept the license agreement, and then click Next.
  4. Click Install.
  5. Click Finish.
After successful completion, open Microsoft Project and a new Project Service Automation tab is displayed on the ribbon. To install this update rollup, do one of the following:
  • To start the installation immediately, click Run.
  • To save the download to your computer for installation later, click Save.
  • To cancel the installation, click Cancel.
